channel.title: Advanced Parameters on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Parameters on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Listing sessions (Customers)
item.description: SPECS LISTING customer SESSIONS Settings wheelWhen clicking on it, 4 options are displayed: Export After clicking on it, the list is exported in CSV format. The export takes into account filters and sorts that have been done Import After clicking on it, the user is redirected to the import page in advanced parameters Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal. The SQL query takes into account filters and sorts that have been done.

item.title: Listing sessions (Employees)
item.description: SPECS LISTING EMPLOYEE SESSIONS Settings wheelWhen clicking on it, 4 options are displayed: Export After clicking on it, the list is exported in CSV format. The export takes into account filters and sorts that have been done Import After clicking on it, the user is redirected to the import page in advanced parameters Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal. The SQL query takes into account filters and sorts that have been done.

Back office token protection - toggle - By default is enabled. Enabled, a token is added in the URL during the navigation in the back office, if the token is invalid, it displays a warning with a message asking if the user really wants to display this page.
